question.text: What would help to keep you alert during a long journey?

explanation.text: Make sure that the vehicle you’re driving is well ventilated. A warm, stuffy atmosphere will make you feel drowsy. Opening a window and turning down the heating can help you to remain alert on a long journey.

answer.text: Using the heater to keep the car warm
Keeping off the motorways and using country roads
Making sure that you get plenty of fresh air
Drinking a sugary drink while driving
